trans-unit.source: Performs composition for containers.
trans-unit.target: 執行容器的組合。

trans-unit.source: This class is used internally by <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個類別是在內部<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>

trans-unit.source: You should generally not use it unless you are authoring a container.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不應該使用它除非您撰寫一個容器。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個型別實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the “Using an Object that Implements IDisposable” section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> that provides the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"> </xref>提供<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref>存取<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref> class, optionally in thread-safe mode.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref>類別，或者在具備執行緒安全模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> that provides the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"> </xref>提供<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref>存取<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if thread safety is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果執行緒安全性必要的。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref> class with the specified options.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref>使用指定的選項類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"></xref> that provides the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider"> </xref>提供<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref>存取<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies options that affect the behavior of the engine.
trans-unit.target: 物件，指定會影響引擎行為的選項。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`Dispose`當您完成使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`方法會使<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>所佔用。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫`Dispose`釋放您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>之前

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Previews all the required imports for the specified part to make sure that they can be satisfied, without actually setting them.
trans-unit.target: 預覽指定的組件，以確定他們但不會實際將它們可以是滿足，所有必要的匯入。

trans-unit.source: The part to preview the imports of.
trans-unit.target: 若要預覽的匯入部分。

trans-unit.source: The composition transaction to use, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for no composition transaction.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用，綜合交易或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>沒有綜合交易。

trans-unit.source: Releases all the exports used to satisfy the imports of the specified part.
trans-unit.target: 釋放所有用來滿足指定的組件的匯入的匯出。

trans-unit.source: The part to release the imports of.
trans-unit.target: 要釋放的匯入之組件。

trans-unit.source: The composition transaction to use, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for no composition transaction.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用，綜合交易或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>沒有綜合交易。

trans-unit.source: Satisfies the imports of the specified part.
trans-unit.target: 滿足指定的組件的匯入。

trans-unit.source: The part to satisfy the imports of.
trans-unit.target: 要符合的匯入之組件。

trans-unit.source: Satisfies the imports of the specified part without registering them for recomposition.
trans-unit.target: 而不註冊它們重新編輯畫就可滿足指定的組件的匯入。

trans-unit.source: The part to satisfy the imports of.
trans-unit.target: 要符合的匯入之組件。
